hero.title: Create Content That
hero.subtitle: The all-in-one platform for creators. Generate, optimize, and monetize your content with AI that understands what makes content spread.

features.title: Everything You Need to Succeed
features.subtitle: Powerful tools designed to help you create better content, grow faster, and monetize your creativity.

aiContent.title: AI Content Generation
aiContent.description: Transform any idea into optimized content for Twitter, LinkedIn, and Instagram in seconds.

videoStudio.title: Video Studio
videoStudio.description: Create stunning AI-generated videos with custom styles and voice cloning capabilities.

analytics.title: Growth Analytics
analytics.description: Track performance, predict virality, and optimize your content strategy with AI insights.

economy.title: Creator Economy
economy.description: Monetize your content with NFTs, fractional ownership, and a thriving marketplace.

collaboration.title: Collaboration
collaboration.description: Co-create with other creators, share styles, and grow together in our community.

enterprise.title: Enterprise Ready
enterprise.description: SOC 2 compliant, white-label solutions, and dedicated support for teams.

cta.title: Ready to Create Amazing Content?
cta.subtitle: Join thousands of creators who are already using FlowAI to grow their audience.

pricing.title: Simple, Transparent Pricing
pricing.subtitle: Start free and scale as you grow. No hidden fees.

cancel.a: Yes! Cancel anytime from your account settings. You'll keep access until the end of your billing period.

payment.q: What payment methods do you accept?
payment.a: We accept all major credit cards (Visa, Mastercard, Amex) and crypto payments via $FLOW tokens.

upgrade.q: Can I upgrade or downgrade my plan?
upgrade.a: Absolutely! Upgrade instantly or downgrade at the end of your billing cycle.

refund.a: We offer a 7-day money-back guarantee if you're not satisfied with our service.

enterprise.title: Need a custom enterprise solution?
enterprise.subtitle: We offer tailored infrastructure and dedicated support for large organizations.

staking.title: $FLOW Token Staking
staking.subtitle: Stake your tokens to earn rewards and participate in governance

flexible.name: Flexible Pool
flexible.description: No lock period - withdraw anytime. Lower APY but maximum flexibility.

thirtyDay.name: 30-Day Lock
thirtyDay.description: Lock your FLOW tokens for 30 days and earn higher rewards.

ninetyDay.name: 90-Day Lock
ninetyDay.description: Premium staking pool with high APY. 90-day commitment required.

diamond.name: Diamond Pool
diamond.description: Exclusive pool for large stakers. Maximum rewards for maximum commitment.

governance.title: Governance
governance.subtitle: Vote on proposals with your staked tokens

auth.termsAgreement: By signing up, you agree to our Terms of Service and Privacy Policy.
